# `ActionErrorState`

## Parameters

---

**<span className="parameter-name">isError</span>** <span className="optional-status">required</span> <code>boolean</code>

**`@returns`**

`true` if an error occurred

**`@depreacted`**

use `!isSuccess` or `!!error` instead

---
